page.title: 10The Burns Club
page.content: In Bowhill there is a "Burns Club" where the members are all fans of the poet Robert Burns. Each year they hold a special competition on the birthday of Robert Burns 25th January, the local school children are invited to recite a poem or sing a song written by Burns. For many weeks we rehearse our pieces with the help of our teachers and parents. On the great day, we go to the Bowhill Institute where judges from the Burns Society are waiting to hear us. The best reciters and singers are given a book of Burns poems as a prize. Those who don't win receive a pen inscribed with "Bowhill Institute Burns Contest."
